name: That Time I Took A Summer Job As A Hitman
name_original: That Time I Took A Summer Job As A Hitman
description:
A game made for the June/July Jackpot Jam:
https://itch.io/jam/junejulyjackpotjam

Goes without saying, the scope for this project was higher than I should have set; I should have realised how little time I would have to work on this project with class on but oh well!

This is a solo project; BESIDES THE MUSIC DOWNLOADED FROM FREEMUSICARCHIVE.ORG the game in its entirety was created solely by me, and within the two weeks set for the June/July Jackpot Jam.


The build labelled "PRERELEASE" is available in the event that I forget to upload the final release.  It is missing audio and the level end. (Unavailable for further downloads)

"PRERELEASE_V2" has been release. Includes an ending +  some homemade sound effects included.

"FINALBUILD" is probably the last version of the game. Includes music downloaded from freemusicarchive.org.

Music Credits

Main Menu song - Effemeah Weeps by Uncan, downloadable at http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Uncanny/~/Effemeah_Weeps (CCO 1.0)

Level song - Roller Fever by Loyalty Freak Music, downloadable at http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Loyalty_Freak_Music/ROLLER_DISCO_DANCE_DANCE/Loyalty_Freak_Music_-_ROLLER_DISCO_DANCE_DANCE_-_01_Roller_Fever (CC By 4.0)
